Package io.netty.handler.proxy

Adds support for client connections via proxy protocols such as SOCKS and HTTP CONNECT tunneling

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpProxyHandler  
    ProxyConnectionEvent  
    ProxyHandler  
    Socks4ProxyHandler  
    Socks5ProxyHandler  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HttpProxyHandler.HttpProxyConnectException
    Specific case of a connection failure, which may include headers from the proxy.
    ProxyConnectException  

Package io.netty.handler.proxy Description

Adds support for client connections via proxy protocols such as SOCKS and HTTP CONNECT tunneling
